title: Spaghetti Carbonara
summary: A classic Italian pasta dish with eggs, cheese, bacon, and black pepper.
instructions: Cook spaghetti in salted boiling water.
Whisk eggs and parmesan together in a bowl.
Drain pasta and mix with pancetta.
Remove from heat and quickly mix in egg mixture.
Season with black pepper and serve.

title: Chicken Tikka Masala
summary: Chunks of grilled chicken (tikka) cooked in a smooth buttery & creamy tomato based gravy.
instructions: Marinate chicken in yogurt and tikka paste for at least 1 hour.
Grill or pan-fry chicken until golden.
Fry onions and spices in a pan.
Add tomato puree and cook until thick.
Stir in cream and add chicken pieces.
Simmer for 10 minutes and serve with rice.
